A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I was absolutely excited to see this. Now\, I regard this as the worst Star Wars movie of the saga. At least the prequels had fantastic choreographed duels. What's the point of the side mission\, the code breaker\, Snoke\, Luke\, this entire movie? Mutiny\, space ships running out of gas\, Leia flying through space?  So much wasted potential. 

Are we really worried about a second rate dark side villain that is now running the Order? He's been physically and mentally defeated in the past. Hardly menacing. 

And poor Luke. What a waste. To have his character be so fragile\, defeated and ultimately useless. Again such wasted potential. I'll remember you as you were\, hopeful\, strong and full of life.
